ws
Class WumpusServer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ws.WumpusServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.lang.Runnable
public class WumpusServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Constants

The server for the wumpus world game. The server will install itself in a port and listen for datagram packets sent by players (agents) that intend to join the game. Once the game is started, every turn this server asks the registered players which actions they intend to execute.

Inner Class Summary
private static class WumpusServer.AgentClient
          Auxiliar class used to store the agent clients connected to this server.
private static class WumpusServer.Client
          Auxiliar class used to store the clients connected to this server.
private  class WumpusServer.JoiningThread
          Auxiliar class used to implement the listening of a port where new players (and monitors) will request their entrance in this server.

explorerPoints

private int explorerPoints
Server parameter: the number of points an explorer has in the beginning of his turn. The server will execute the actions the agent request as long as the explorer has enough points.

walkPoints, grabPoints, shootPoints, turnPoints, talkPoints, nopPoints

timeBetweenTurns

private long timeBetweenTurns
The timeout that happens between two turns. Useful for the monitors be able to refresh themselves.

turnPoints

private int turnPoints
Server parameter: the number of points required for the agent to turn.
See Also:
explorerPoints, wumpusPoints

voiceDecay

private double voiceDecay
Server parameter: the decay of the voice of agents, as the distance from the speaker to the listener grows bigger than the voice reach parameter.

voiceReach

private int voiceReach
Server parameter: the reach of the voice of the agents. The value of this parameter is the distance from which the speech of an agent will be garbled.

walkPoints

private int walkPoints
Server parameter: the number of points required for the agent to walk.
See Also:
explorerPoints, wumpusPoints

world

private WumpusWorld world
The wumpus world managed by this server.

wumpusPoints

private int wumpusPoints
Server parameter: the number of points a wumpus has in the beginning of his turn. The server will execute the actions the agent requests as long as the wumpus has enough points.
See Also:

Constructor Detail

WumpusServer

public WumpusServer(WumpusWorld world,
                    int serverPort,
                    int joinServerPort)
             throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new Wumpus Server, given the port it will stay listening for requests.
Parameters:
world - the wumpus world this server will manage. It must initially be empty (i.e., no wumpuses or explorers).
serverPort - the port number of this server.
joinServerPort - the port number of the server waiting for join requests.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the datagram socket can't be created.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Test method of the class.
Parameters:
args - command-line arguments. The user must enter the port number of the server, and the port number of the join server.

perceptionsToString

private static java.lang.String perceptionsToString(Perceptions p)
Auxiliar method, used to transform a set of perceptions into a string that will be sent to the agent clients.
Parameters:
p - the set of perceptions
Returns:
a string to be sent to the agent clients.

processActions

private java.lang.String processActions(WumpusServer.AgentClient client,
                                        java.lang.String msg)
Processes the actions received from an agent client. This method will return the end turn tag that should be sent back to the client.
Parameters:
client - the agent client from which the actions came.
msg - the message that came from the client.
Returns:
the end turn tag that shall be sent back to the client.

run

public void run()
The main part of this class. Continuously listens for datagrams in a port, responding to them as they arrive.
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

sayGoodbye

private void sayGoodbye(Agent agent)
Sends to an agent a message indicating that it was killed. Also, warns the monitors that the agent was killed.
Parameters:
agent - the agent that was killed.
